title: Dialogue 3
raw:
これ小学生の頃よくやったヤツ！

スーパーサイヤ人とかって
translated:
I used to play with this back in elementary school!

Like going Super Saiyan (sensored)

title: Dialogue 4
translated: ...But if I really think about it

title: Dialogue 5
raw: 何で下敷きに髪が引っ張られるんだろう？
translated: Why is my hair pulled to the plastic sheet?

title: Dialogue 6
raw:
それは磁石と同じように

電気にも「＋と－で引き合う」性質があるからですよ一！
translated:
That's just like magnets

Electricity also has the property of "positives and negatives attract"!

title: Dialogue 7
raw: 下敷きを擦ると下敷きはーに人の体は＋に帯電します
translated: When you rub the plastic sheet, the sheet gets negatively charged and the person's body gets positively charged.

title: Dialogue 8
raw: 下敷きの材質によって変わります
translated: Therefore the plastic sheet's properties change

title: Dialogue 9
raw: なので＋とーが引っ張り合い髪がモワとッ立つわけです
translated: Because the + and - pull towards eachother, that's the cause for the hair to stand up so much

title: Dialogue 10
raw: ちなみに+と-など同属性同士は反発します
translated: Conversely, if both are the same charge they will repel each other

title: Dialogue 11
raw: へぇー！そうだったんだー
translated: Wow! So that's what it is-(music sign)
